name: ApplyUpdate
friendlyName: LCS Apply Update (for D365 FO on-premise only)
description: Task to start only the Update of the Dynamics 365 Finance + Operations (on-premises) environment if the Prepare has successfully finished
author: Alna Business

inputs.name: serviceConnectionName
inputs.label: LCS Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a Dynamics Lifecycle Services connection to be used

inputs.name: projectId
inputs.label: LCS Project Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Project Id of the Dynamics Lifecycle Services project containing the asset and environment

inputs.name: environmentId
inputs.label: LCS Environment Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Environment Id of the Dynamics Lifecycle Services environment to deploy to. Deploying to production environments is not supported.

inputs.name: preparationActivityId
inputs.label: Preparation Activity Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Preparation Activity Id of the Dynamics Lifecycle Services preparation activity started in LCS Asset Prepare task.

inputs.name: deploymentType
inputs.label: Type of asset
inputs.helpMarkDown: Type of asset to deploy in the environment.

options.hqonprem: Software deployable package for on-premises environments
